categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic repulsorcraft

nodes.text: The T2-B Repulsor Tank was a vehicle used by the Rebel Alliance early in the Galactic Civil War. Delivered to the Rebellion by treasonous military contractors, its armor and repulsorlifts made up for a lack of heavy weapons. An enhanced version existed, however, which rectified this weakness.
Several of the tanks were deployed to a Rebel refueling depot on Vrogas Vas. They were sent out to apprehend Imperial leader and Sith Lord Darth Vader, but they were all destroyed by Vader.
The T2-B appears first appeared in Star Wars Canon in the 2014 mobile game Star Wars: Commander. The T2-B Repulsor tank originated in the Star Wars Legends video game Star Wars: Empire at War.
